attributes.action: Honour the vote to leave the European Union made on 23rd of June, 2016 by the UK
attributes.additional_details: A democratic vote was made by the people of the United Kingdom to leave the EU. This was a democratic vote. I refer to the concern over the current decision making by the government, the opposition and the House of Lords to delay or influence that decision.
attributes.background: Should we leave the European Union?
